thread.title: Pat Webb
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Pat Webb

author: Pat Webb
title: Pat Webb
text: January 6th I ordered a hat for my husband and it wasn't big enough so after contact with Country Attire I ordered a second one which was OK. I was allowed to return the first hat and on January 16th I received a full refund with NO postage charge. Absolutely brilliant service, thank you very much.
